text: has renamed the channel from "hack-a-thon" to "themes-challenge"
Because Style Fields are in Beta, i am wondering if a theme submitted to the challenge can have them or not

hey <@UBT0AHWLD>, per the rules, they need to be included with your submission:
-------
*4. SUBMISSION REQUIREMENTS*

• Develop a theme for HubSpot’s CMS platform that:
    ◦ Meets all the Asset Marketplace submissions guidelines and theme requirements stated here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines > AND here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-requirements/theme-requirements>.
• AND includes these features / functionalities: 
        ▪︎ <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas|Drag and Drop Areas>
        ▪︎ <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/drag-and-drop-areas/sections#reusable-sections|Drag and Drop Area Sections>
        ▪︎ <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields/branding-settings-inheritance|Branding Settings Inheritance>
    ◦ <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields-overview#style-fields|Module and Theme Style Fields>
--------
View the full rules here: <https://HubSpot.devpost.com/rules>
